snippet.title: Close To The Sun - Announcement Trailer Gamescom 2017
snippet.description:
Close to the Sun is a horror game that takes place in the late 1890s century on a mysterious ship complex created by Nikola Tesla for the sake of knowledge. In this alternative version of history, his scientific breakthroughs have already had a major impact on the world.  You’re a young journalist looking for your sister and, as you approach this enormous and glorious complex for the first time, you quickly realize that something there has gone wrong...
Release Date 2018 TBD
